TEXT: Please call Stella.  Ask her to bring these things with her from the store:  Six spoons of fresh snow peas, five thick slabs of blue cheese, and maybe a snack for her brother Bob.  We also need a small plastic snake and a big toy frog for the kids.  She can scoop these things into three red bags, and we will go meet her Wednesday at the train station.

TRANSCRIPTION: p l iː s k ɑː l ɪ s t ɛ l ɚ æ s k h ɜː t ə b ɹ ɪ ŋ ð iː z t ɪ ŋ z w ɪ ð h ɚ f ɹ ʌ m ð ɛ s t ɔːɹ s ɪ k s s p uː n z ʌ v f ɹ ɛ ʃ ə s n oʊ ɾ i f aɪ v t ɪ k ɪ s l æ b z aʊ b l uː tʃ ɪ z æ n d m eɪ b iː ɐ s n æ k f ɔːɹ h ɚ b ɹ ʌ ð ɚ b ɑː b l iː ɔː l s oʊ n iː d ɐ s m ɔː l k l æ s t ɪ k ɐ s n eɪ k æ n d ɐ b ɪ k t oʊ f ɹ ɑː ɡ f ɔːɹ ð ə k ɪ d z ʃ iː k æ n ɪ s k uː t t iː z t ɪ ŋ ɪ n t ʊ t ɹ iː t ɹ eɪ d b æ ɡ z æ n d w iː w ɪ ɡ oʊ m iː t h ɜː w ɛ n z ð eɪ æ t ð ɛ t ɹ eɪ n ɪ s t eɪ ʃ ə n
